snippet: Ms. Blum, a former social services official, made it her mission to find homes for mentally disabled people after their mistreatment at the Willowbrook State School on Staten Island became a national scandal in the 1970s.
abstract: Barbara Blum, social worker who found homes for mentally disabled people after their mistreatment at the Willowbrook State School, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Blum, a former social services official, made it her mission to find homes for mentally disabled people after their mistreatment at the Willowbrook State School on Staten Island became a national scandal in the 1970s.

headline.seo: Barbara Blum, Who Rescued Abused Willowbrook Residents, Dies at 82
headline.main: Barbara Blum, Who Rescued Abused Willowbrook Residents, Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Barbara Blum, 82, Dies; Saved Willowbrook Residents
